thread.title: Christine Lau
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Christine Lau

author: Christine Lau
title: Christine Lau
text:
I do a lot business travel and usually plan everything myself, so when the offer came up over the internet, to get a free itinerary, I was sceptical but why not.
When the travel agent contacted me, what I would like to do, I replied with a lot of items I had looked up. Waterfalls, zip Lining, white water rafting and so on.
I didn't expect to fit it all into my week. But when I got the first proposal I was amazed, we switched some dates for the tours around. We added some tours, it turned out to be a wonderful vacation and experience. Dyionne did an outstanding job, checked always for the availabilities of the tours and made things happen. I probably will book with Namu again. Everything was perfect, the Hotel, the tours and how it was planned. Traveled in January 2017.
